title: (5) T206 For Sale Inc 1 Polar Bear *** SOLD***
author: vintagechris

posts.post_title: (5) T206 For Sale Inc 1 Polar Bear *** SOLD***
posts.post_content:
***SOLD*** Would prefer to sell these as one lot. 5 T206 cards. Doyle has a small crease on right. The discoloration on the red background is a print defect, not paper loss. Devlin is stained, no creases. Perring has a heavy crease on his right shoulder and a small crease above that on the left border. Dunn has 2 small corner creases in upper right corner. Downey has a polar Bear back with a small crease at the bottom. $100 delivered for the group.
